pages.text: Waystones are tools used by witches to fold space through the spirit world, allowing them to 'blip' from one location to another. A waystone must first be bound to a location, and then may be used to return to the bound location.

$(l)Rite of Binding$()$(br2)$(o)Bind a waystone to a certain location$()$(br2) - Waystone$(br) - Ender Dew$(br) - Glowstone Dust$(br2)Altar power: 500$(br)Charged attuned stone allowed$(br2)Small ritual circle
$(l)Rite of Transposition$()$(br2)$(o)Fold space around a waystone to bring any creatures in the circle to the bound location$()$(br2) - Bound Waystone$(br2)Small otherwhere circle
